name: lyrica
description: Lyrica - Agentic Song Lyrics Generator Monorepo

scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd lyrica-backend && bash scripts/setup.sh && cd ..
scripts.kill:ports: lsof -ti:8000,3000,8081,5432,6379,8001 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ All ports are free'
scripts.kill:backend: lsof -ti:8000 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ Backend port (8000) is free'
scripts.kill:web: lsof -ti:3000 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ Web port (3000) is free'
scripts.kill:mobile: lsof -ti:8081 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ Mobile port (8081) is free'
scripts.restart: pnpm kill:all && pnpm docker:up && pnpm dev
